name: Shiratori
description:
This is a fan game of a demo made originally by Creature Jungle developer, Ko-ta. I used a majority of the assets from the demo and some from Creature Jungle 16/256. I developed it on STG Builder. Music created by Scowsh.

MOVE = ARROW KEYS OR PAD DIRECTIONS

Graze bullets to turn your halo surrounding you from red to green. When it turns green, you can use your laser (BOMB) to destroy enemies and turn bullets into 800 bonus items!

See how many points you can get in 2 minutes!

Developed by desmaku for Negaverse Technical Institute

Music by Scowsh

 itch page is: https://scowsh.itch.io/ 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/scowshmolosh 

YouTube: https://youtube.com/@scowsh

version 0.25 - there is one small bug where an enemy disappears when they are done shooting, ill fix it later
